H0.text: In the bible who betrayed Samson to the Philistines by revealing that his strength was due to his long hair. Jezebel

H1.text: In the bible who betrayed Samson to the Philistines by revealing that his strength was due to his long hair. Bathsheba

H2.text: In the bible who betrayed Samson to the Philistines by revealing that his strength was due to his long hair. Michal

H3.text: In the bible who betrayed Samson to the Philistines by revealing that his strength was due to his long hair. Dlila

A4.text: She cut Samson's hair while he slept

A5.text: She delivered him into the hands of the waiting Philistine chiefs
